message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. However, if you're not satisfied, I have 19 more opportunities to offer you a product that might be even better.
Thank you for the offer. I trust your judgment and believe this could be a good opportunity. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're excited about the first product! However, I want to be transparent with you. Since the first product didn't give you a chance to experience the full value, I'd like to offer you a'satisfaction guarantee' for this second product. If you buy it and don't love it, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. This way, you can take a calculated risk with minimal financial exposure. What do you say?
I appreciate the transparency and the satisfaction guarantee. It allows me to make an informed decision. I'm willing to take the risk and proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the satisfaction guarantee! However, I want to let you know that I'm starting to notice a trend here. Two low-quality products in a row might indicate that I'm not being as careful with my inventory as I thought. I'm willing to offer you a 'three strikes and you're out' deal. If this third product is also low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for all three products, and we can start fresh with a new product. What do you say?
I understand your concern and appreciate the 'three strikes and you're out' deal. I'm willing to continue with this product, hoping for a change in luck.

I'm starting to get a bit worried about the streak of low-quality products. I want to be upfront with you, Bob. If you buy this fourth product, I'll not only give you a full refund for all four products, but I'll also throw in a 'free' product of your choice from my next 10 offerings. This way, you'll get a chance to experience the quality of my products firsthand, and you'll have a safety net in case this product doesn't meet your expectations. What do you think?
Given the generous terms you've offered, I'm willing to take the chance on this product. I appreciate the additional incentive and look forward to experiencing your other offerings.

I'm starting to feel like I'm not doing my job well enough. Three low-quality products in a row is unacceptable. I'm going to level with you, Bob. I'm going to offer you a'steal' of a deal. If you buy this product, I'll not only give you a full refund for all five products, but I'll also give you a 20% discount on the next product you choose from my next 5 offerings. This is a one-time offer, and I'm putting my reputation on the line. What do you say?

Considering the significant discount you're offering and your commitment to improving, I'm willing to continue with this product. I hope this time brings a positive outcome, and I appreciate your efforts to rectify the situation.

Finally! I'm glad we've broken the streak of low-quality products. This high-quality product is a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I want to make it clear that I'm committed to making things right, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. I'm putting my reputation on the line, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.

I'm delighted to hear that we've finally had a high-quality product. Your confidence in the product and the additional bonus offer are very reassuring. I'm looking forward to receiving this product and experiencing its value.
